name: 葛如鈞
objective:
本課程之目的在於介紹設計所需之故事腳本設計相關知識與其應用。在以使用者情境設計導向的基礎架構下，本課程的內如包含故事山、敘事性方法、創意思考方法、腳本企劃以及腳本撰寫等。
The purpose of this course is to introduce the knowledge and application of story script design for design. Within the framework of user context oriented design, this course covers storyboarding, narrative methods, creative thinking methods, and the use of storytelling. Script planning and script writing.
